title: Kuradashi: E-Commerce Website that Combines Food Loss with Social Good | TOKYO UPDATES [The Official ... - TOKYO UPDATES（トーキョー・アップデーツ）
summary: Kuradashi, an e-commerce website, operates a social good market that aims to reduce food loss by selling discounted food products nearing their best-by dates, offering consumers the chance to help reduce food waste and support social action organizations. The company's efforts extend beyond e-commerce, including collaborations with local governments and social entrepreneurship support, striving to make Tokyo a leader in sustainability. Kuradashi's business model, which involves purchasing surplus products from manufacturers and redistributing them through its online platform while supporting social causes, constitutes both a green and business innovation.
